sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(187, 111, 59), rgb(0, 0, 0))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="220px"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/stage.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        app
        :style="appbarStyle"
    >
      <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
        <v-img
            v-bind="props"
            gradient="to top, rgba(0,0,0,.8), rgba(0,0,0,.2)"
        ></v-img>
      </template>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-toolbar-title :style="`${this.fontStyle}`">
        Heavify
      </v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    appbarStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'sm': return ""
        case 'md': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;"
        case 'lg': return "9px;"
        case 'xl': return "10px;"
      }
    },
    fontStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'xs': return "font-size:10px;position:relative;float: left !important;"
        case 'sm': return "font-size:22px;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:28px;"
        case 'lg': return "9px;"
        case 'xl': return "10px;"
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-toolbar__title {
    font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif;
  }
</style>
